Market Pulse provides real-time tracking of major global market indices right in your browser. Stay updated with live market data from:

• SENSEX (BSE)
• NIFTY 50
• Dow Jones
• S&P 500
• FTSE 100
• And more!

Features:
✓ Real-time market data updates
✓ Customizable market selection
✓ Clean, modern interface
✓ Trading hours indicator
✓ Currency indicator
✓ Drag and resize functionality

Perfect for traders, investors, and anyone who needs to keep an eye on global markets throughout the day.

Privacy & Security:
• No personal data collection
• Data sourced directly from Yahoo Finance
• No ads or tracking
